txt.en: You've captured both goats. Deliver them to Stúkha at the crest of Jax Phanâl.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The rams will find their way if you become separated.</rgb>
You used the sedative, now capture the beast
Runax refuses to attack and begins to follow.
Challenge Shâba in the hills near Jax Phanâl
Deliver the pair of rams to Stúkha at the crest of Jax Phanâl
You are too far away to apply the toxin
Deliver the pair of goats to Stúkha at the crest of Jax Phanâl
Collect a collar for Rûnax
Collect the collar for Shâba

'In the hills, mountains, and sometimes the plains there are two goats standing tall above others in the herd. They are the sire and the dam.

'They mate each season and raise their young. They are known for their strength. We want them for our pit entertainment.

'When you find them, I ask that you defeat them after using this sedative upon them. It will ensure that they do not die, but fall into slumber.

'Collect them then after they fall into this slumber and return them to me.'
Defeat Rûnax and force him to follow you
You collared Shâba
Place a collar on Rûnax
You are too far away to apply the toxin
Shâba pounds the ground and prepares to fight.
Defeat Shâba and force her to follow you
You forced Rûnax to submit and the ram is now docile toward you
Place a collar on Shâba
Captured the herd's sire, Rûnax

'My friend, you return victorious.

'This pair will serve us well and bring joy to those who watch the battles in Umbar.

'You are well thanked for your assistance in collecting these specimens for me.'

Rothog's emissary sent you into the hills and wilds in search of the matriarch and patriarch of the wild goats that make the western Cape of Umbar their home. You are to apply a sedative to them, defeat them and return them to the emissary at Jax Phanâl.

Head into the wilds of the western Cape of Umbar. Search the plains, hills, and mountain edges for the goat sire and dam. Weaken them and use the toxin on them docile. When you've captured both goats, deliver them to Stúkha at the crest of Jax Phanâl.
Deliver the captured sire and dam to Stúkha
Capture the herd's sire, Rûnax
You place the collar on Rûnax.
Capture the herd's dam, Shâba
You place the collar on Shâba.
You have collared Rûnax
You have collared Shâba
Shâba becomes docile and now follows.
Rûnax appears to dislike you disturbing his stroll.
Use the sedative on the dam or sire
Shâba is perturbed you spoiled her walk.
Place the collar on Shâba
You forced Shâba to submit and the ewe is now docile toward you
Captured the herd's dam, Shâba
You've captured both goats. Deliver them to Stúkha at the crest of Jax Phanâl.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The rams will find their way if you become separated.</rgb>
You are close enough to apply the toxin to Rûnax
Challenge Rûnax in the hills of the Cape of Umbar West
Runax pounds the ground and sets to attack.

'My friend, you return to me victorious.

'This pair will serve us well and bring joy to those who watch the battles in Umbar.

'Your assistance in this matter is most welcome. Please accept this gift. I am grateful that you've proven so useful to me.'

'My friend, you return to me victorious.

'This pair will serve us well and bring joy to those who watch the battles in Umbar.

'Your assistance in this matter is most welcome. Please accept this gift. I am grateful that you've proven so useful to me.'
You are close enough to apply the toxin to Shâba

'The pair will not likely be together, but the sedative will work on each of them. It will weaken them. They will not lose their fight.

'Be wary of their herd, they will call to them for defence. 

'Survive the battle. Capture them and deliver them to me here.'

'In the hills, mountains, and sometimes the plains there are two goats standing tall above others in the herd. They are the sire and the dam. When you find them, I ask that you defeat them after using this sedative upon them. It will ensure that they do not die, but fall into slumber. Collect them then after they fall into this slumber and return them to me.'
Sire and Dam
